description: Lists all attempt of a job run.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application for which to list job runs.

parameters.name: jobRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the job run to list.

nested_items.name: jobRunAttempts
nested_items.description: The array of the listed job run attempt objects.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application the job is running on.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the job run attempt.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the job run attempt.

nested_items.name: mode
nested_items.description: The mode of the job run attempt.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the job run.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the job run.

nested_items.name: jobCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the job run was created.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run attempt was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the job run attempt was last updated.

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the execution role of the job run..

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the job run attempt.

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: The state details of the job run attempt.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The Amazon EMR release label of the job run attempt.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the job run, such as Spark or Hive.

nested_items.name: attempt
nested_items.description: The attempt number of the job run execution.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The output displays the token for the next set of application results. This is required for pagination and is available as a response of the previous request.
